descriptions:
Title: Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest, Massage Lumbar, Ergonomic Reclining Leather PC Gamer Chair – Purple

Overview:
Level up comfort and performance with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair. Wrapped in premium soft PU leather with hand-sewn diamond cross stitching, this high-back racer-style chair blends sleek aesthetics with serious ergonomic support. A USB-powered massage lumbar pillow, adjustable headrest, and retractable footrest help you relax during long gaming or work sessions, while heavy-duty components deliver stability you can trust.

Key Features:
- Premium build and finish:
  - Soft PU leather with hand-sewn diamond cross stitching for durability and style.
  - Integrated metal frame and thickened, explosion-proof chassis for long-term strength.
  - 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase; tested for 2000 miles of rolling.
  - SGS and BIFMA certificated gas cylinder for safety and smooth height adjustment.

- Ergonomic comfort for marathon sessions:
  - USB-powered lumbar pillow with massage function to ease lower back tension.
  - Detachable, adjustable headrest and adjustable lumbar support.
  - Retractable footrest to kick back between matches or during breaks.
  - High-density shaped foam seat cushion (4.3 in thick) with great resilience and breathability.

- Fully adjustable for your perfect fit:
  - Reclining backrest from 90° to 155° with adjustable tilt mechanism and safety lock.
  - 15° rocking function for natural movement.
  - 360° swivel and height-adjustable seat for easy positioning.
  - 2D armrests: vertical (up/down) and horizontal (right/left) adjustments with soft PU leather coating.

- Strong and stable performance:
  - Maximum weight capacity: 330 lb.
  - 5-point base engineered to resist rollover and provide steady mobility.

- Designed for gaming and office:
  - Ideal for gamers, streamers, and professionals seeking long-lasting comfort and support.
  - Purple finish adds a bold, modern look to any setup.

Ease of Use:
- Easy assembly with included instructions; many screws pre-assembled to save time.

Warranty and Support:
- One-month free return policy.
- 5 years free parts replacement.
- 24/7 customer service focused on a great ownership experience.

What’s in the box:
- Darkecho Gaming Office Chair (Purple)
- USB-powered massage lumbar pillow
- Adjustable, detachable headrest
- Retractable footrest (pre-installed components)
- Assembly hardware and instructions

Specifications:
- Material: Premium soft PU leather; high-density shaped foam seat (4.3 in)
- Color: Purple
- Recline: 90°–155° with safety lock
- Rocking: 15°
- Swivel: 360°
- Armrests: 2D adjustable (up/down, right/left)
- Frame: Integrated metal
- Base: 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover
- Gas lift: SGS & BIFMA certificated
- Weight capacity: 330 lb

Choose Darkecho for a chair that combines massage comfort, robust engineering, and precision adjustability—perfect for dominating game nights and powering through workdays.
